practice_phrases: 你真好。
That's very kind of you.
她说你真好。
She said that's very kind of you.
我的朋友说你真好。
My friend said that's very kind of you.
你真好，没问题。
That's very kind of you, no problem.
当你和他们一起工作时你真好。
When you work with them that's very kind of you.
我很高兴你真好。
I'm very happy that's very kind of you.
当然，你真好，因为一切都好。
Of course, that's very kind of you, because everything is okay.
这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方，你真好。
This is where my friend wanted to meet us, that's very kind of you.
我不知道为什么她说你真好，但这不是问题。
I don't know why she said that's very kind of you, but this is not a problem.
当你和他们一起做困难的事情时你真好，我很高兴你经常说话。
When you do difficult things with them that's very kind of you, I'm very happy you talk often.

lego: I'm grateful to you for helping
